Our Working Process

Step-by-Step Guide to Achieving Your Business Goals

By simply using your browser, you can access the platform. During this process, you'll undergo an initial assessment where the system will ask you questions to assess your skills and understands your learning goals.

Based on the initial assessment, the app generates a customized learning plan. This plan outlines the key areas of focus and the strategies the app will use to help improve the your English speaking skills.

You will engage in interactive learning sessions with the AI tutor right on your mobile device. These sessions include exercises designed to improve pronunciation, fluency, and overall speaking skills. Speak until you become a Speaking Jedi.

The AI tutor continuously tracks the your progress and adjusts the learning plan as needed. This ensures that the learning experience is always tailored to your current needs and skill level.

You will be able to receive regular progress reports right within the app. These reports provides valuable feedback on improvements, areas for further practice, and recommendations for next steps.

Based on the feedback and user's performance, the AI tutor updates the learning plan, ensuring that the user is always progressing towards their English speaking goals.
